subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=10|sn=13|four=|canj=PWMO|ids=⿰[[忄]][[圂]]}}

# (variant of [[慁]]) to [[dishonour]], to [[disgrace]]
# to [[distress]], [[grief]]
# [[shame]]
# [[disobey]]
# to [[be]] [[anxious]], to be [[apprehensive]], to [[worry]]
# to [[disturb]] or to [[agitate]], to [[harass]]
# [[confused]] and [[disorderly]]
